official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the
		  eligibility under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of certain
		  individuals with service-connected disabilities who transfer to reserve
		  components before discharge from the Armed Forces.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Chris Kotch VA Education Access Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Eligibility for
			 Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of certain individuals with
			 service-connected disabilities who transfer to reserve components before
			 discharge from the Armed Forces

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 3311(b)(2)(B) of title 38, United
			 States Code

quote.#text:
is discharged or released from
			 active duty in the Armed Forces

is discharged or
			 released from the Armed Forces or transferred to the temporary disability
			 retirement list

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall take effect as if included in the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Chris Kotch VA Education Access Act/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Post-9/11 Veterans
			 Educational Assistance Act of 2008
